title: Bec Judd's bizarre crystal jumpsuit divides fans who claim it's so bad she must have been paid
text:
Rebecca Judd's latest outfit has divided her longtime fans.

The WAG made the brave choice to do away with a dress and to wear a crystal coloured jumpsuit at the Caulfield Cup in Melbourne on Saturday.

The fashion icon wore a sparkly purple jumpsuit with a tall pair of striking heels and an aqua coloured headband.

'I feel like David Bowie would be vibing this outfit!' Rebecca Judd's Caulfield Cup outfit has divided her longtime fans

Bec captioned the image: 'I feel like David Bowie would be vibing this outfit'.

Although the majority of comments praised her choice of outfit, there was a fair amount of negativity too.

'Not sure about Bowie. Maybe Lost In Space?' one fan commented.

Unique: The WAG made the brave choice to do away with a dress and to wear a crystal coloured jumpsuit at the Caulfield Cup in Melbourne on Saturday

'You're so stunning but this outfit is so bad, you must of gotten paid to wear this,' added another.

'Awful dress and headband. Sorry,' wrote another.

Bec was not without her support though, receiving plenty of compliments from the celebrity community, including Nadia Bartel and model Steph Claire Smith.

'You're so stunning but this outfit is so bad, you must of gotten paid to wear this,' wrote one fan

'This is good. So sooo good,' Bec's sister Kate Twigley said.

Skincare guru Zoe Foster Blake also praised the WAG for branching out with her outfit.

'SUPERSONIC!! Takin’ risks and havin’ fun with lewks and makin’ it all look so easy,' she gushed.
description: Rebecca Judd's latest outfit has divided her longtime fans.
authors: Tom Place For Daily Mail Australia
